contents.text: Thank you for calling DroneDeploy in San Francisco, the leading drone software platform for unlimited flying, mapping, and sharing.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
For product demos and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need to understand pricing options and book a product demo.
Ask about veteran pricing and schedule a product demo.
Discuss pricing tiers, evaluate API integration capabilities, and schedule a demo.
I’d like a live demonstration of how your drone mapping software works and an overview of pricing plans.
I want to schedule a product demo and discuss pricing options for DroneDeploy’s aerial mapping software for my research projects.

contents.text: For trial setup and account activation, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our account setup team.

navigationGoals: I want to activate my trial account and get my login credentials.
Activate a free trial account using a veteran discount code.
Activate my trial account and configure team access with SSO.
I need assistance setting up a trial account and activating my access to the platform.
I need to activate a trial account with DroneDeploy so I can begin mapping data for my physics lab experiments.

contents.text: For technical support and billing, press 2.
For technical troubleshooting and software issues, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to troubleshoot a software issue causing errors in my mapping project.
Troubleshoot a drone image import error in the mapping software.
Troubleshoot the API mapping upload failure causing software crash.
I’m having trouble with the software—its mapping feature keeps freezing—and I need technical help to fix it.
I’m experiencing errors when exporting my mapping datasets and need technical support to troubleshoot the software.

contents.text: For billing, payments, and invoice questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to clarify a charge on my invoice and process my payment.
Clarify an unexpected billing charge and request a veteran discount.
Clarify charges on my latest invoice and process the payment.
I have questions about my latest invoice and need help understanding and paying my bill.
I have questions about my latest DroneDeploy invoice and payment options for my student subscription.
